subsection.name: 1. Overview
subsection.p: FnDateMidnight is a function hub class containing a lot of static methods to convert from various input objects to DateMidnight. Those static methods return functions whose output is DateMidnight and whose input can be Calendar, Date, Integer list and Long among others.

td.p: It converts a Calendar into a DateMidnight
It converts a Calendar into a DateMidnight in the given DateTimeZone
It converts a Calendar into a DateMidnight with the given Chronology
The input Date is converted into a DateMidnight
The input Date is converted into a DateMidnight configured with the given DateTimeZone
The input Date is converted into a DateMidnight with the given Chronology
A DateMidnight is created from the input Integer array.
The valid input Integer[] are:

ul.li: year (month and day will be set to 1)
year, month (day will be set to 1)
year, month, day

td.p: A DateMidnight is created from the given Integer array. The result will be created with the given Chronology
The valid input Integer[] are:

ul.li: year (month and day will be set to 1)
year, month (day will be set to 1)
year, month, day

td.p: A DateMidnight is created from the input Integer Collection.
The valid input Collection<Integer> are:

ul.li: year (month and day will be set to 1)
year, month (day will be set to 1)
year, month, day

td.p: A DateMidnight is created from the input Integer Collection. The result will be created with the given Chronology
The valid input Collection<Integer> are:

ul.li: year (month and day will be set to 1)
year, month (day will be set to 1)
year, month, day

td.p: The input Long representing the time in milliseconds is converted into a DateMidnight
The input Long representing the time in milliseconds is converted into a DateMidnight in the given DateTimeZone
The input Long representing the time in milliseconds is converted into a DateMidnight with the given Chronology
A DateMidnight is created from the given String array.
The valid input String[] are:

ul.li: year (month and day will be set to 1)
year, month (day will be set to 1)
year, month, day

td.p: A DateMidnight is created from the input String array. The result will be created with the given Chronology
The valid input String[] are:

ul.li: year (month and day will be set to 1)
year, month (day will be set to 1)
year, month, day

td.p: A DateMidnight is created from the input String Collection.
The valid input Collection<String> are:

ul.li: year (month and day will be set to 1)
year, month (day will be set to 1)
year, month, day

td.p: A DateMidnight is created from the input String Collection. The result will be created with the given Chronology
The valid input Collection<String> are:

ul.li: year (month and day will be set to 1)
year, month (day will be set to 1)
year, month, day

td.p: It converts the input String into a DateMidnight using the given pattern parameter. If the pattern includes either, the name of the month or day of week, a conversion accepting a Locale must be used instead

It converts the input String into a DateMidnight using the given pattern parameter and with the given DateTimeZone. If the pattern includes either, the name of the month or day of week, a conversion accepting a Locale must be used instead

It converts the input String into a DateMidnight using the given pattern parameter and with the given Chronology. If the pattern includes either, the name of the month or day of week, a conversion accepting a Locale must be used instead
It converts the input String into a DateMidnight using the given pattern and Locale parameters
It converts the input String into a DateMidnight using the given pattern and Locale parameters

tr.td:
String pattern
Locale locale
DateTimeZone dateTimeZone

td.p: It converts the input String into a DateMidnight using the given pattern and Locale parameters. The DateMidnight is configured with the given DateTimeZone

tr.td:
String pattern
String locale
DateTimeZone dateTimeZone

td.p: It converts the input String into a DateMidnight using the given pattern and Locale parameters. The DateMidnight is configured with the given DateTimeZone

tr.td:
String pattern
Locale locale
Chronology chronology

td.p: It converts the input String into a DateMidnight using the given pattern and Locale parameters. The DateMidnight will be created with the given Chronology

tr.td:
String pattern
String locale
Chronology chronology

td.p: It converts the input String into a DateMidnight using the given pattern and Locale parameters. The DateMidnight will be created with the given Chronology
The input Timestamp is converted into a DateMidnight
The input Timestamp is converted into a DateMidnight in the given DateTimeZone
The input Timestamp is converted into a DateMidnight with the given Chronology
